data.title: Tio Latino
data.meta_description: Eating, Drinking & Having Fun, THE LATINO WAYInspired by the vivacious culture of Latin America – where the dance is fun, the food is fresh, and the vendors know each customer by name – Tio Latino brings out the playful side in every guest.
data.text:
Inspired by the vivacious culture of Latin America – where the dance is fun, the food is fresh, and the

vendors know each customer by name – Tio Latino brings out the playful side in every guest.

Feast your eyes and taste buds on the vibrant Mexican tacos, creamy mole, flavourful burritos, tangy Peruvian ceviche, crispy Argentinian empanadas, delicious choripan, and more. Our menu features a variety of dishes from different regions of Latin America, so you can discover new flavours and indulge in your favourites.

Thirsty? The bar is stocked with refreshing beers, wines, and spirits, as well as classic and signature cocktails that are sure to get the party started. Try our famous Cuba Libre, Caipirinha, Mojito or Margarita: Tio’s got everything you need to spice up your night!

Tio Latino offers more that great food and drinks: a visit to Tio’s place is an immersive experience,

bringing you the sounds, colours, and flavours of America Latina.

As soon as you step inside, you’ll be greeted by an eclectic mix of bright and bold hues, from rich violet, blues and greens to fiery reds and oranges. Our walls are adorned with colourful murals and graffiti art that pay tribute to the urban landscapes of Latin America, adding a touch of edgy cool to the space.

Whether you’re sitting at the bar or lounging in one of our cosy booths, you’ll be surrounded by a dynamic and lively atmosphere that’s perfect for soaking up the energy and excitement of Latin America.

So, come on down to Tio Latino and join in on the fun! The colourful and playful decor, friendly staff, and energetic atmosphere are sure to make your dining experience one to remember.
